meanings.definition: To convert (a fat or oil) into soap by reaction with an alkali.
meanings.sent1: She was saponifying the oil to make soap for her handmade products.
meanings.sent2: The chemist explained the process of saponifying fats to create soap.
meanings.sent3: The kitchen was filled with the pleasant smell of saponifying oil into soap.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity saponified the mundane oil into a luxurious bar of soap.
meanings.sent5: The bubbling mixture saponifying in the pot was a mesmerizing sight.

meanings.sent1: The oil was saponifying slowly in the reaction.
meanings.sent2: The substance began saponifying as soon as it was mixed with the alkali.
meanings.sent3: The experiment went wrong when the solution started saponifying unexpectedly.
meanings.sent4: The ingredients seemed to saponify magically before their eyes.
meanings.sent5: The process of saponifying was fascinating to watch under the microscope.
